content.rendered:
THE FORD EVEREST* PX SERIES 2 EVOLUTION 3D FRONT REPLACEMENT WINCH BAR IS HERE!

This is the start of our new Evolution 3D range of bars and its even beter than our last! These new bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 rated recovery points, market leading angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate all as standard. They are also fully compatible with the Tech pack including front parking sensors, front radar sensor and even the park assist sensors of which no other bar on teh market can allow for.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat or can be colour coded as an option. All our parts are now zinc plated before powder coating to ensure a long rust free life. They are a 3mm and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel or colour coded with the rest of the bar. We also offer as standard, LED foglights which are an extra on many other brands.

-The Evolution bumper has carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. Crash testing is vital to ensure your air bags fire wen they should. When comparing bars ensure dynamic crash testing is carried out for your safety. During install the Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

Includes: The below are included items that are charged as extra on other brands

Winch mount (no additional brackets required)

Integrated LED Fog lights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Hinged numberplate bracket to access winch areaIf vehicle doesn’t have front parking sensors blanketing plugs for holes will be supplied
Optional

Can be colour coded to match your vehicle

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned in stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight mounting bar

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT FORD EVEREST 2015-2018

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
